EmailTemplate.name: Role Modeler - Impact Analysis Review
EmailTemplate.Body:
An impact analysis of role '$roleName' has been assigned to you.
Login and view your work item inbox to complete this review.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying role impact analysis reviewers. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: roleName
Argument.Description: The name of the role being analyzed.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Review impact analysis of role: $roleName
